description: This file defines a LightningJS component for the intro page of a quiz application, which includes a centered title, subtitle, start and help buttons, and a tooltip. It sets up state, child components, and event handlers for navigation and tooltip display.

classes.name: Component
classes.description: A LightningJS component defining the intro page layout and behavior.

methods.name: state
methods.description: Returns initial state variables for layout and content.

methods.name: components
methods.description: Returns child components used within this component.

methods.name: onReady
methods.description: Sets up event handlers for buttons after the component has been rendered.
